bibl.title: Le "Dakhleh Oasis Project": quelques résultats préliminaires.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: C.A. MARLOW and A.J. MILLS (Edd.), The Oasis Papers 1: The Proceedings of the First Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 6 (Oxford, 2001); - Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), with contributions by several authors, Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002).
bibl.seg: REDDÉ Michel, Le "Dakhleh Oasis Project": quelques résultats préliminaires.
